trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Oceanside
There were no other sightings in Oceanside on or around March 11th 2008
Summary: Blue like star but keeps moving around in the same area.
divs: Sighting DetailsWent out on my back patio with my husband.we were just getting done unpacking for the night,we looked up at all the stars and noticed that one was blue and moving... I got pretty worried and watched for only a few minutes. The object seemed to be moving like a balloon but when it did we could see light trailing behind it.It was trying to stay in the same place but would move about every 10-15 seconds or so.then the movement got more jerky after we had watched it for a few more minutes.Then we got even more concerned and come in doors. We live on Camp Pendleton and can't hear it make any noise at all.we know what a air plane and a helicopter sounds like.this had no noise at all.
